creditline: Gift of Richard and Linda Parins
description: Men holding down cables attached to the sides of a large, inflating hot air balloon
markings: \'DBAL267\', in pencil, lower left corner, on back; untranslated stamp, in Russian, at lower right corner on back, \'PRINTED UNDER THE SUPERVISION OF/TATIANA BALTERMANTS/FROM a NEGATIVE BY/DMITRII BALTERMANTS/THIS IS PRINT NO. 22/25 [illegible signature]/[copyright] ESTATE OF DMITRII BALTERMANTS\', on stamp, at lower right corner, on back
title: Before Sputnik
